snippet: A wave of bombings and a shooting killed at least 24 civilians on Tuesday, as insurgents tried to undermine government efforts to maintain security.
abstract: Wave of bombings and one shooting kill at least 24 civilians in Iraq, as insurgents tried to undermine government efforts to maintain security.
lead_paragraph: A wave of bombings and a shooting killed at least 24 civilians on Tuesday, as insurgents tried to undermine government efforts to maintain security.
